channel.title: Learn to Speak Chinese in 5 Minutes!
channel.description:
Well I am qutie board so i thought I would post this little joke. Please note that this is not meant to be racial towards chinese in any way, and if it does affend you, I am terribly sorry. This is just for fun.
1. That's not right..........................................Sum Ting Wong 2. Are you harbouring a fugitive.........................Hu Yu Hai Ding 3. See me ASAP.......................................................Kum Hai 4. Stupid Man..........................................................Dum Fuk 5. Small horse......................................................Tai Ni Po Ni 6. Did you go to the beach................................ Wai Yu so Tan 7. I bumped the coffee table......................Ai Bang Mai Fa Kin Ni 8. I think you need a face lift................................. Chin Tu Fat 9. It's very dark in here.......................................... Wai So Dim 10. I thought you were on a diet...................... Wai Yu Kum Ching 11. This is a tow away zone......................................No Pah King 12. Our meeting is scheduled for next week........... Wai Yu Kum Nao 13. Staying out of sight............................................. Lei Ying Lo 14. He's cleaning hi automobile.................................. Wa Shing Ka 15.Your body odor is offensive................................ Yu Stin Ki Pu 16. Great............................................................. Fa Kin Su Pah
Have fun ;)

item.title: Learn to Speak Chinese in 5 Minutes!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“The Solid, post:34, topic:186891”]10. I thought you were on a diet...................... Wai Yu Kum Ching

i couldn’t get this for a while…

i figured it was “Why you crunching” horrible translation.[/quote]

It’s supposed to be “wai yu mun ching”.

item.title: Learn to Speak Chinese in 5 Minutes!
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

LOL this is my fav one:

  1. That’s not right…Sum Ting Wong
  2. Are you harbouring a fugitive…Hu Yu Hai Ding
  3. See me ASAP…Kum Hai
    4. Stupid Man…Dum Fuk
  4. Small horse…Tai Ni Po Ni
  5. Did you go to the beach… Wai Yu so Tan
  6. I bumped the coffee table…Ai Bang Mai Fa Kin Ni
  7. I think you need a face lift… Chin Tu Fat
  8. It’s very dark in here… Wai So Dim
  9. I thought you were on a diet… Wai Yu Kum Ching
  10. This is a tow away zone…No Pah King
  11. Our meeting is scheduled for next week… Wai Yu Kum Nao
  12. Staying out of sight… Lei Ying Lo
  13. He’s cleaning hi automobile… Wa Shing Ka
    15.Your body odor is offensive… Yu Stin Ki Pu
  14. Great… Fa Kin Su Pah

Read full topic
